data.author: Simon Bailey

changelog.release_notes: I've modified the vibration sequence that happens at the end of the countdown so it now vibrates the Morse Code for "All Because", which is the strapline for Milk Tray
Updated to show the countdown in minutes and seconds, rather than just seconds.

A little app that is based on the Tea Timer example.

As the Milk Tray Man, you select your Mission and it will then countdown to 0 then display the Milk Tray Man logo. The first mission in the list is 1 minute, with each successive mission in the list going up in 1 minute intervals.

As I'm currently in the running to be the next Milk Tray Man, this is just a bit of fun.

data.description:
Need a countdown for your next daring chocolate delivery mission?

This little app, based on the Tea Timer Example, gives you 20 mission timers that start with the a 1 minute timer for the first mission and each successive mission is a minute longer, you simply select how long you need, by selecting the appropriate mission.

latest_release.release_notes: I've modified the vibration sequence that happens at the end of the countdown so it now vibrates the Morse Code for "All Because", which is the strapline for Milk Tray

data.title: Milk Tray Man Mission Timer
